metadata.title: Erowid Hydrocodone (Vicodin) Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of Hydrocodone (Vicodin).

content:
Drug: Hydrocodone | cid: 5284569
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of Hydrocodone (Vicodin).
Erowid name: hydrocodone
Category: PHARMS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    Effects

by Erowid

DURATION #

Caution : Reactions and experiences may vary dramatically from person to person. [see below]

EFFECTS LIST #

POSITIVE

improvement of mood

reduction of pain

euphoria

NEUTRAL

itching

light-headedness

sedation

changes in focus and attention

NEGATIVE

dizziness

constipation

nausea and vomiting

when insufflated, burning in nose and sinuses

Some adverse effects may be alleviated by lying down. Nausea, vomiting and the like increase as dose increases.

DESCRIPTION #

Hydrocodone is a semisynthetic narcotic analgesic and antitussive with multiple actions qualitatively similar to those of codeine. Most of these involve the central nervous system and smooth muscle. The precise mechanism of action of hydrocodone and other opiates is not known, although it is believed to relate to the existance of opiate receptors in the central nervous system. In addition to analgesia, narcotics may produce drowsiness, changes in mood and mental clouding.


                    Context: 
                    This chunk provides a detailed description of hydrocodone’s effects, duration, and pharmacology, serving as a specialized subsection within the broader "Pharms" section of the Erowid substance database. It summarizes positive, neutral, and negative effects, along with information on its mechanism of action and usage considerations, making it highly relevant for understanding hydrocodone's impact and risks.

                    Text: 
                    CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid's effects information is a summary of data gathered from users, research, and other resources. This information is intended to describe the range of effects people report experiencing. Effects may vary dramatically from one person to another or one experience to another based on a variety of factors such as body chemistry, age, gender, physical health, dose, form of material, etc.

RELATED RESOURCES #

RELATED LINKS #

None

                    Context: 
                    This chunk is the "CAUTION & DISCLAIMER" section of the Hydrocodone (Vicodin) page within the Erowid pharmaceuticals database. It outlines the limitations of effect reports, emphasizing individual variability and factors influencing experiences. This section is crucial for understanding the scope and reliability of the information related to hydrocodone's effects.
